Subject: Support for NetAPP running in Azure?
Description:
We currently have the Stealthbits activity monitor running on our file server. We are looking to move our file shares from an on premise Windows server to a Netapp appliance running in Azure.

Will the stealthbits activity monitor still be able to be used against the Netapp appliance in Azure?  I do not believe we will have access to the NetApp appliance itself...

If not are there any solutions from Netwrix that we can use to monitor our file shares?

I would have contacted my account rep and sales engineer but I dont know who they are.

Thank You
Mike
Solution_Comment__c:
It might work Depending on the NetApp type you are planning to use.
There are different flavors of NetApp in Azure:

NetApp Cloud Volumes ONTAP (Cloud Volumes ONTAP for Azure â€“ Azure CVO | NetApp). 

Azure NetApp Files ( https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/products/netapp).
Last time we checked, it didn't support the FPolicy protocol (the protocol we use for 
The last time we checked, it didn't support the FPolicy protocol (the protocol we use for activity collection).
